title: ‘Today It’s Way Harder to Win’: Cavendish vs. Merckx, Who is the Tour de France GOAT?
content:
'Those days of Merckx are over. What Cavendish did is just insane:' Belgian pro Oliver Naesen says peloton holds deep respect for what the Manxman accomplished.

Read the full article at ‘Today It’s Way Harder to Win’: Cavendish vs. Merckx, Who is the Tour de France GOAT? on Velo.
author: ahood
